name: Cad
content:
Cad was a human male soldier for the Alliance to Restore the Republic. During the Galactic Civil War between the Alliance and the Galactic Empire, he fought Imperial troops on the moon Jedha.
Cad was a human male who joined the Alliance to Restore the Republic sometime during or before the year 0 BBY.
Cad was a light-skinned human with brown eyes.
Cad wore the fatigues of a Rebel trooper.
Cad was created as a playable character for the online browser video game Star Wars: Boots on the Ground. Players could select Cad to be a member of their three-man rebel squad.
